Text: Ernest Augustus (5 June 1771 – 18 November 1851) was King of Hanover from 20 June 1837 until his death.

Text: Ernest Augustus, King of Hanover:  The Salic Law, which barred succession to or through a female, prevailed in Hanover; therefore, when his elder brother King William IV died in 1837, Ernest succeeded him as King of Hanover.
